summary: 获取逻辑表的路由算法配置列表。

schema.description: 逻辑库的表ID，可通过调用接口[ListLogicTables](~~141875~~)获取该参数的值。
租户ID，可通过调用接口[GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~)获取该参数的值。

ErrorMessage.example: TableId is mandatory for this action.

Success.description:
请求是否成功，返回值如下：
- **true**：请求成功
- **false**：请求失败

items.description: 路由算法配置列表信息。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "7C6A0D7D-B034-59F6-854C-32425AC6****",
  "ErrorCode": "MissingTableId",
  "ErrorMessage": "TableId is mandatory for this action.",
  "Success": true,
  "LogicTableRouteConfigList": {
    "LogicTableRouteConfig": [
      {
        "RouteKey": "1",
        "RouteExpr": "#id#%16\\t",
        "TableId": 0
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<ListLogicTableRouteConfigResponse>
    <RequestId>7C6A0D7D-B034-59F6-854C-32425AC6****</RequestId>
    <LogicTableRouteConfigList>
        <LogicTableRouteConfig>
            <TableId>1****</TableId>
            <RouteExpr>#id#%16	</RouteExpr>
            <RouteKey>1</RouteKey>
        </LogicTableRouteConfig>
        <LogicTableRouteConfig>
            <TableId>1****</TableId>
            <RouteExpr>#id#%16	</RouteExpr>
            <RouteKey>id-hash-mod17	</RouteKey>
        </LogicTableRouteConfig>
        <LogicTableRouteConfig>
            <TableId>1****</TableId>
            <RouteExpr>#id#%16	</RouteExpr>
            <RouteKey>id-test</RouteKey>
        </LogicTableRouteConfig>
    </LogicTableRouteConfigList>
    <Success>true</Success>
</ListLogicTableRouteConfigResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 获取逻辑表的路由算法列表
